price: Dia-lah yang memperlihatkan kepadamu tanda-tanda (kekuasaan)-Nya dan menurunkan untukmu rezeki dari langit.  Dan tiadalah mendapat pelajaran, kecuali orang-orang yang kembali (kepada Allah).
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقٗاۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yurīkum āyātihi wayunazzilu lakum mina al-samāi riz'qan wamā yatadhakkaru illā man yunību
